activities: The Company will collect and use personal information only for legitimate business purposes, including (but not limited to) (i) work performed at customer request using personal information supplied by customer and (ii) various human resources-related functions such as global enterprise headcount reporting; statistical analysis; compensation planning, payment and related transactions; health, welfare and retirement benefits administration;career development; staffing; international personal security issues; internal investigations; ethics investigations; law enforcement inquiries; U.S. Government agency inquiries and mergers, acquisitions and divestitures.
personaldata: off-line, on-line, manually processed data, HR data
